abstract: Ajay Banga, the head of Citigroup’s Asia Pacific region, is leaving the troubled bank for a top management post at MasterCard.
snippet: Ajay Banga, the head of Citigroup’s Asia Pacific region, is leaving the troubled bank for a top management post at MasterCard.
lead_paragraph: Ajay Banga, the head of Citigroup’s Asia Pacific region, is leaving the troubled bank for a top management post at MasterCard.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Asia Unit Chief Is Going to MasterCard
headline.print_headline: Citigroup’s Asia Unit Chief Is Going to MasterCard
